description: A login button with blue background and white text

output.html_css: <button id="loginBtn" style="background-color: blue; color: white; padding: 10px 20px; border: none; border-radius: 5px;">Log In</button>

description: A text input field for username on login page

output.html_css: <input id="username" type="text" style="padding: 8px; border: 2px solid gray; border-radius: 4px; width: 200px;" placeholder="Enter username">

javascript_suggestions.code: function validateUsername() { const val = document.getElementById('username').value; if(val.length < 3) alert('Username too short'); }

description: A password field with a subtle shadow

output.html_css: <input id="password" type="password" style="padding: 8px; border: 1px solid #ccc; box-shadow: 2px 2px 5px rgba(0,0,0,0.1); width: 200px;" placeholder="Password">

javascript_suggestions.code: function toggleVisibility() { const pwd = document.getElementById('password'); pwd.type = pwd.type === 'password' ? 'text' : 'password'; }
function checkStrength() { const pwd = document.getElementById('password').value; if(pwd.length < 8) alert('Password too weak'); }

description: A payment submit button with green background

output.html_css: <button id="payBtn" style="background-color: #28a745; color: white; padding: 12px 25px; border: none; border-radius: 6px;">Pay Now</button>

description: A credit card input field for payment page

output.html_css: <input id="cardNumber" type="text" style="padding: 10px; border: 2px dashed #007bff; width: 250px;" placeholder="Card Number">

javascript_suggestions.code: function formatCard() { const card = document.getElementById('cardNumber'); card.value = card.value.replace(/\D/g, '').replace(/(.{4})/g, '$1 '); }
function validateCard() { const card = document.getElementById('cardNumber').value; if(card.length < 19) alert('Invalid card'); }

description: A blog subscription email input

function subscribe() { const email = document.getElementById('subscribeEmail').value; console.log('Subscribed: ' + email); }
